Text:
It is time.
To the north and east!

Halt! It is too quiet...
Even the crickets do not sing...

Drop your weapons and we'll
let your women live...with us!
Bandits!

'Tis fortunate they were
drunk. Alcohol will gift a man
bravery...but always for a price.
Run!
Not without me you don't!

We'll be taking these...
and these...and also these.

Hahaha! Tonight we dine
as champions of the steppe!

The steppe is no
place for the weak!

The bandits will tell others
of this battle, and they will
be drawn to the promise of
blood and plunder. We move!
Sounds of fighting!

There! A lone warrior...and
a mammoth!
She will not survive.

Then she will not survive.
That is the way of the steppe.
No! We cannot just leave her!

The steppe is full of enemies.
This is why we must embrace
newfound friends.
There is little life left in her.

She was a fool to
walk the steppe alone.

That's no reason to leave
her to die, Anarba!
Altani speaks true.

We shall make camp here
and decide as a tribe how
we are to proceed.

I will see to the
stranger's wounds.
Altani, you look uneasy.
The sheep... They won't eat.
Won't eat, you say? That is odd...

It might be they
sense something amiss.

You stay here while I see
if I cannot discover the
reason for their disquiet.
Yes, Khan! And...be careful.
Altani was right.
The sheep will calm now.

That horse... It doesn't
appear to be one of ours.
Where is your rider, boy?

You look hungry. Come with
me. Altani will see you fed
and watered.
They're finally leaving...
You're awake.

I have you and your tribe
to thank for that.
That's not all.
Bayan! You're... You're...!

My apologies. I was just so─
I am Gurbesu of the Goro.
This is my promised, Bayan.

My tribe's food tents were
destroyed in a Matanga raid.

I went hunting to replenish
our supplies and in my
desperation─
Attacked a mammoth.
Attacked a mammoth.

If you had not intervened...
My life, I owe to your
people.

What of the rest
of your tribe?

I do not know. We lost many
in the raid, and if the Matanga
attacked again while I was
hunting...
The steppe... It moves!
Look! Over there!
\\<trumpet>
Au Ra!

Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!

We are discovered!
Spears out!
Back! Back! Baaack!
They're running away!

They were no match
for our courage.

The Matanga...
They were here for me.
I cannot stay here.

I am the cause
of this destruction.

Nonsense! You shared our
water, our fire. You stood
at our side in battle.

What will you do now,
Gurbesu of the Goro?
The only thing I can─search for my tribe.
Then we will search with you.

You are one of us now, and
we would not allow a sister
to walk the steppe alone.
I... I don't know what to say...

Then say nothing.
It is already decided.
I've fed and watered Bayan.
Thank you... Thank you all!

We ride, my people!
But keep your weapons
at the ready! All eyes ahead!
Father sun, almighty...

The Matanga have returned...
and this time in numbers.
To caves! To caves!

Something is wrong. That was
too organized for a retreat...

Then let us rest
while we can.

Gurbesu. You say that
beyond lies the location
of your tribe's last camp?

Yes, Khan. While I expect it
to be abandoned, perhaps
we will find some clue as
to which direction they fled.
We should be nearing it now.
Wait... I see smoke...

It appears your tribe did not
leave...nor did the Matanga!
Au Ra! Many and more!

Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!
Back to caves!

Death come, Au Ra!
Death come!

My brothers! My sisters!
You are safe!

As are you and Bayan.
This is good.
But you do not come alone.
Tell me, Gurbesu...

Why would the Dataq lift
their spears for the Goro?

We would lift them for
Gurbesu, so we would
lift them for you.
Khan...
\\<trumpet>
Kill all! Kill all!

Death to Au Ra!
Death to trunkless!

Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!

There is no Dataq and no
Goro. Only sisters and
brothers of the steppe!
Kiiiiiiiiilll!
King come! Au Ra kill!

Anjana come!
Give blood to earth!
Why do they not attack?
That is why!
WHERE ARE MY CHILDREN!?
Together! Stand together!
CEASE THIS CLAMOR!
ENOUGH!
Anjana dead! Matanga lost!
Away! Away!

They break! Now the
slaughter begins!

Anarba! Is it not enough
that the day is ours?

Khan is right, Anarba. No
more blood need be spilled
this day.

Let us see to the wounded
then leave this cursed place.

Brothers and sisters of the
Dataq, we are forever in
your debt.

The song of your tribe's
bravery will be sung at
our fires for generations
to come.

As they will at ours,
brave Goro. Until we
meet again.

Dataq! To your mounts.
We ride!
Farewell, Gurbesu. Bayan.
Farewell!

The more mercy you show, the less you'll receive from me!
Now, BEGIN!
It ends here, Adri!

Guerrilla tactics, shield
walls─neither'll save my
men from the cannons of
an imperial reaper.

No... What they need is
something unpredictable.
Something volatile...

There is only one rule on
the front lines: don't break.
Break and you're dea─
You there! Are you listening!?
One! Two! Three!
Again!

A parry that slow
will be your last!
Faster! Faster!
\\<doze>
S-Sir! Dead, sir! Yes, sir!
One!
Two!
Three!
How long do we have to wait?

They promise us a mock
battle, but give us lectures.
Kissed by the Fury, indeed!
Such strength! Such speed!
Hahaha! I haven't been so frightened for my life since I was a recruit!

Do you think they've
had enough?

Enough? When I was their
age I broke my fast on
heroes of the realm!

Alright, maybe
they've had enough.

But that doesn't mean I'm
letting them off easy!
Twelve help us all...
We're not finished yet!
You cannot defeat us all!
Your time has come!

Fools! Beaten by your
own meaten!

That is why always you
are hungering!
Bow down before me!
Leave this one to me!
Please... Just one more word.
I'm saved! (I hope!)
It is as I said!
The Buduga!

How did they
get behind us!?

The village is
not much further!

Thank you, traveler. My
tribe will see me safe now.
I am a Mol!
Leave me alone!
There is nowhere to run, boy!

Your tribe will not have
you back now!
We are your tribe now!
One of us! One of us!
You ahem-ed?

Were you going to call
in reinforcements?
I hadn't planned on it.
Perhaps you should?
Perhaps.
Go! Gather weapons now!
To Ala Gannha!
To town of meat!
Father! Father!

\\<sigh> Another night in
the stables, I reckon.

Neutralize the enemy's capacity to heal its wounded.
Standard battle tactics.
And then there were two!
And then there was one─one with the strength of ten!
I wasn't in best form today...
Well this is embarrassing...
You needn't have pulled your punches...but this act of clemence is certain to cheer the men's spirits. \\

Not all our men are as green
as the recruits!
If you underestimated us, perhaps the Empire will, too!
Gah hah hah hah hah!
Stay your blades! We yield!
Much was to be had from the day's exercises.
May they see us─may they see Eorzea to victory!
My instruments are picking something up!
Blades down! That is enough!

It was an honor to exchange
blows with you this day.

Of course, emerging victorious
didn't hurt, either. Gah hah hah!

Time to check the nets
I laid last night.

Flying sharks!? This far
from the Tide!?

My nets torn and my catch
devoured! What am I to do!?
Damnable sharks!

Now I'll have to find a new
place farther up river!

The waters no longer boil.
The sharks have returned
to the Tide.

Now to see if there is aught
remaining of my ne─
Hells take me! It's a...a... giant weasel!

What have I done
to deserve this!?
Is it...dead?
It is! The weasel is dead!

Wait... Flying sharks and giant
weasels? My wife is never
going to believe me!
I need to catch some fish...now!

How am I going to explain
this to my wife? I'm doomed...

Traveler! Over here!
OVER HERE!

What are we going to do?
What are we going to do!?
Is this enough? I suppose it's enough... But what if it's not enough? What if old nan dies because we didn't have that one last seedling!

Thank the stars
we will not starve!

We're doomed... The Empire
will take what little we have
and leave us to starve!
Heh heh heh!
Catch me if you can!

Four here... Six there...
They're everywhere!

If all these eggs
were to hatch...

You have already brought
me so many, I couldn't think
of asking you to bring more...
unless you wanted to, that is.

The village thanks you...
as does my belly!

I must warn
the other villagers...

It can't be...!
It was just a story!

This is the place
the villagers spoke of.

From here emerges the evil
spirit that haunts their fields.
It is here I will find my quarry!

Shall I wait,
or shall I attack?

Can you feel it?
The creature approaches!
There! With me!
There are others!?

What foul plot requires
this many servants!?

I will not be
defeated so easily!
Come! I do not fear death!

I may have
failed the village...

But this land has not seen
the last of Senban Oneblade!
Victory is ours!

The onmyoji's henchmen will
trouble the villagers no longer.

Yet I fear his work
is far from complete.

He plots something most
treacherous, and I will not
rest until he has been silenced!

A plump pack you have
there traveler! Oh, so plump!
A right plump pack, yes!
Open that pack!
Pack! Pack! Pack!
More blood!
Ooooooooow!
I'll make this quick!
Tigers! And they look hungry!
I...think my bath can wait!
Where is everyone going?
T-T-T-T-T-TIGERS!!!

Don't eat me! I'm fugu!
Aaaaaack!
Farewell...cruel world...
Poke it again!
Poke poke poke poke!
Now you poke it!
Poke it harder! Harder!

Gouge <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> eyes!
Cut out <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> tongue!

None who bear witness
shall be suffered to live!

You have not seen
the last of us, meddler!

What funny hats...
Maybe they'll let me have one.
Aaah! Aaah! Aaaaaahhh!
You can keep your hats!

Gaei out battling
injustice again, eh?

Looks as if both
sides are Lupin.

You know how Gaei gets
about trading blows with
his brothers.

You're free to do what you
please, my friend. I'll stay here.
When will you learn, Gaei?
Your pack is weak!
Argh! That smarts...! What are these... Arrows?
The archer! Kill him first!

Uh... We can still discuss
this like civil wolves!
A Kojin? Here in Yanxia?

We've enough to worry about
here without those shellbacks.

Let this one live, and another
hundred will be on the shores
by new moon.
Then let's see him dead!
Move!
Did he just─?
Ruuuuuun!

Victory is sweetest when
won with a straight heart!
Ooooooooow!
\\<sigh> Let's see now...
...250,000. That should suffice.

None can withstand the
might of Yojimbo! Hahahah!
Yes, bring me their heads!
Let us see...
This time you're finished! Hahahah!
All's well!
Gah!
Oho...
Hm hmmm...
Good, precise movements.
You have a feel for the blade.
Hah!

They won't make
me one of them!
I want to go home!
For...ever...
And...ever...
Farewell, Mother... Father...
Woooaaagh!
Yaaargh!
Eat this!
Die!
We came for the treasure! Yes, yes! Where is it?
It is mine! Everything here─it is all mine!
To go left or to go right? That is the question...
Show no mercy to any who stand in our way!
Retreat! Retreat!
You want to fight? Yes, yes! Well, it is a fight you will get!
I will cut you down!
Graaah!
Aaargh! <If(PlayerParameter(4))>She<Else/>He</If> got me─right in the gut!
The best fighters know when to stay and when to flee! Ghahaha! You shan't catch me!
It was all true!

I'm never leaving
my bed again!

Was it truly Tsurubebi...
or something else...?

No. Don't tell me.
I don't want to know.

I'm never leaving
my bed again!
They've surrounded us...
There must be some way...
Right then. Follow my lead.

Those are mine!
Mine! Mine! Mine!
Hit him in the head! The head!

Those are mine!
Mine! Mine! Mine!

Right to the whiskers!
The whiskers!
GRAYHYGRAGRRRYAH!
Pick the pack! Pick the pack!

Keep your plump pack!
Keep it! Keep it!
You will always be weak!
\\<whimper> \\<whimper>

Might I suggest a strategic,
yet not at all shameful retreat?

They'll think twice before
coming back...won't they?

Kindest of kindly strangers!
Mimiroon is most grateful
for such kind kindness!

You will protect me, then?
Twelve be praised!
Aaah! We're discovered!

Rats as those deserve
no mercy! Not a damn whit!

Please...\\<cough> \\<hack> 
\\<wheeze> Hurry...! \\<choke>

Spoken like a
true fellow warrior!
My life is in your hands!

Look!
The chapulis draw near!
Hrnnng!
I have <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If>! I have <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If>!
One! Two! Three!
Diamond Dust!
Is this right?
Hero? Hah!
The vase will be ours!
Come, let us keep moving.
Eyes on the prize!
I-I'll just wait over here.
Look out!
My legs are about to give out.
Hurry up and win!
Help me! I'm dying!
Time to go!
No give up!
Hurry!
Slow down!
No no no!
Oh, so scary...
Slay bad ones!
Help!
After you, then!
Then you are with us!
May Rhalgr grant us strength!
Then you are with us!
May Rhalgr grant us strength!
Shall we get going?
Maybe I should have brought my sword...
Do you need to rest?
Wait, not so fast!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, your help!
If only I were stronger...
Another beast blocks our path.
I cannot carry on much longer...
What an amazing place!
So this is the Isle of Endless Summer. Beautiful.
Today, we swim!
Wait for me!
Oh me, oh my, look at all these lovely little things out today. And they're all just my type.
What was that? I could have sworn I heard something.
You're imagining things.
Hey, ladies! Care to come have a romp with me?
Eeeeeek!
Don't be shy, now. There's no use running away!
A talking octopus!? Is this some new voidsent!?
Ugh, all those muscles. You're not my type!
I may be just an octopus, but I'll not lose to the likes of you!
This is not looking good... Oh no, I forgot to call Master Typhon.
Master Typhon! Heeelp meee!
Hyah!
You'll not ruin our faire!
Argh!
Ow, ow, ow! Enough, enough!
I yield, I yield! I just wanted...to enjoy the faire...like everyone else.
I find that hard to believe.
I promise I'll be good. I swear!
Do you? Step out of line again, and you won't get off so easy.
Gwee-hee-hee. I promise, I promise. An octopus always keeps his word.
Gwee-hee-hee! Such pretty little things!
Mwa ha ha! Just my type!
Farewell, farewell!
I can't be bothered with this anymore!
Gwee-hee-hee! Where are all the laaadies!?
The big ones are biting! Need any bait?
Could you stand to part with one of those?
That'll be 1,000,000 gil!
You're out of your mind!
You blaming me? Huh!?
I'll take my business elsewhere.
Trying to make off without paying? Get back here, you bastard!
You looking to get yourself hurt?
S-Stop it!
You two! What's going on!?
Bah, damned faire chaperones. Come on!
I'm leaving this fight to you!
Run awaaay!
Hyah!
Take that!
Go back to your damn faire!
Arrrgh!
Stop this at once!
Stand down!
These bastards are strong... Retreat! Retreat!
Serves you right for not minding your business. Come on, after that fisherman!
And don't come back!
Ugh... It's no use. We have to fall back.
All that's left is to deliver these fish.
Snippers! Why did it have to be snippers!?
Shoo! Shoo!
Keep it up!
Thanks. You saved me, and my fish.
No! My fish... My beautiful fish...
Gods be good... Look at all this rubbish!
Thank you! You've made the beach beautiful again!
It's no good. There's still too much rubbish. We may need more hands.
Bring me your rubbish! Every last bit you can find!
Gather your rubbish! I'll collect it!
Thanks for the help. I think our work here is done.
If you still have rubbish, I'll take it off your hands!
A <If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),1))>promising<Else/>plain</If> <sheet(Treasure,IntegerParameter(3),0)> is discovered upon defeating <ennoun(BNpcName,2,IntegerParameter(2),1,1)>!
You still wish to fight? My sword is only too happy to oblige!
The world has no place for such wretches.
Your claim to life is forfeit!
Damn you... Damn you all!
Common rabble...
Save me!
Ah hah hah hah hah!
Death is too light a punishment for your ilk!
Repent, maggots!

O hallowed moon,
shine you the iron path!

O hallowed moon,
take fire and scorch my foes!

Blazing path,
lead me to iron rule!

Take fire,
O hallowed moon!

From on high I descend,
the iron path to walk!

From on high I descend,
the hallowed moon to call!
